body: It has been a while since we last did one, so me and spookez will host one. Post your team tags here and get on teamspeak when the next slots of scrim servers are available (30 min from now). Poke me or spookez when you are in teamspeak to be moved.
body_tagged: It has been a while since we last did one, so me and spookez will host one. Post your team tags here and get on teamspeak when the next slots of scrim servers are available (30 min from now). Poke me or spookez when you are in teamspeak to be moved.
title: Mega scrim in 30 minutes
